title: What Happens After Election Day
description:
One of the most closely watched and most expensive midterms in recent history is coming to a close. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Kate Hunter on what to watch this Election Day and what happens next after the votes are tallied. 
FOLLOW UP
 Kate's latest report: Midterm Reckoning on Trump Sets Stage for 2020
You can follow Kate at: @Kate_HunterDC
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
